content.description: Consider the static method selectSort shown below. Method selectSort is intended to sort an array into increasing order; however, it does not always work as intended.
content.question: // precondition: numbers.length > 0 // postcondition: numbers is sorted in increasing order public static void selectSort(int[] numbers) { int temp; Line 1: for (int j = 0; j < numbers.length - 1; j++) { Line 2: int pos = 0; Line 3: for (int k = j + 1; k < numbers.length; k++) { Line 4: if (numbers[k] < numbers[pos]) { Line 5: pos = k; } } temp = numbers[j]; numbers[j] = numbers[pos]; numbers[pos] = temp; } } Which of the following changes should be made so that selectSort will work as intended?

choices.label: Line 1 should be changed to for (int j = 0; j < numbers.length - 2; j++)
Line 2 should be changed to int pos = j;
Line 3 should be changed to for (int k = 0; k < numbers.length; k++)
Line 4 should be changed to if (numbers[k] > numbers[pos])

content.answer: Line 2 should be changed to int pos = j;
